content: Youâ€™ve requested to change the email address on your {{productName}} account. To proceed, please sign in using your current credentials.

comment.text: This text is displayed to users who have requested to change the email address associated with their {{productName}} account. It instructs them to sign in using their current credentials to proceed with the email change process. It appears within the login flow.
